metadata.name: Fractured Mind
metadata.description:
Digital artwork, oil/canvas aspect.

The mind is fragmented and the eye is blank , no emotions or feelings can fill the spaces of this mental construct.

Colors are attempting to intertwine in  apparent flows unsuccessfully, the construct is flawed by the rigid borders and no apparent union can be achieved  .

Expanding on the methods of the abstract expressionists, I've built a mirrored image of my mind 
with surfaces which do not blend and with areas of apparent randomness.

The Rigidness of colors, the borders are splashing my own vision of the abstract realm of arts which is ... limitless !

Size:15 MB, JPEG
Dimensions:15120x9870
DPI :96
Year:2022
